title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\KnowledgeBase
name: KnowledgeBase
description:
A knowledge base represents a collection of knowledge documents that you provide to Dialogflow. Your knowledge documents contain information that may be useful during conversations with end-users. Some Dialogflow features use knowledge bases when looking for a response to an end-user input.

For more information, see the knowledge base guide. Note: The projects.agent.knowledgeBases resource is deprecated; only use projects.knowledgeBases.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.KnowledgeBase

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The knowledge base resource name. The name must be empty when creating a knowledge base. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/knowledgeBases/<Knowledge Base ID>.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Required. The display name of the knowledge base. The name must be 1024 bytes or less; otherwise, the creation request fails.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Language which represents the KnowledgeBase. When the KnowledgeBase is created/updated, expect this to be present for non en-us languages. When unspecified, the default language code en-us applies.
